columns.id: The unique identifier for each customer.
columns.name: The full name of the customer.
columns.age: The age of the customer in years.
columns.membership_credit: The total credit available for the customer's membership.

Customers.table_description: The table tracks customer details for vehicle rental.

columns.id: The unique identifier for each discount.
columns.name: The description of the discount offered.
columns.membership_credit: The credit amount required for the discount.

Discount.table_description: The table tracks discount offers for vehicle rentals.

columns.id: The unique identifier for each vehicle.
columns.name: The name of the vehicle model.
columns.Model_year: The manufacturing year of the vehicle.
columns.Type_of_powertrain: The type of powertrain used in the vehicle.
columns.Combined_fuel_economy_rate: The overall fuel economy rate for the vehicle.
columns.City_fuel_economy_rate: The city driving fuel economy rate for the vehicle.
columns.Highway_fuel_economy_rate: The highway driving fuel economy rate for the vehicle.
columns.Cost_per_25_miles: The estimated cost for driving 25 miles.
columns.Annual_fuel_cost: The estimated annual fuel cost associated with the vehicle.
columns.Notes: Additional notes or comments regarding the vehicle.

Vehicles.table_description: The table provides details about vehicles available for rent.

columns.id: The unique identifier for each renting record.
columns.customer_id: The unique identifier for the customer renting the vehicle.
columns.discount_id: The identifier for any discount applied to the rental.
columns.vehicles_id: The unique identifier for the vehicle being rented.
columns.total_hours: The total duration of the rental in hours.

Renting_history.table_description: The table records the history of vehicle rentals by customers.
